GS39purukadu:1: * idānīm ātmabhuvā kriyamāṇe saptatantau tatsādhanatvenānirvacanīyasukhodbodhahetutvena vāruṇīprāśanam anudarśayati ananyajasaptatantāv iti || 1.1
GS39purukadu:2: * anutṛṣyanti anirvacanīyānandaṃ prāpnuvanti anenety anutarṣaṃ kādambaraṃ
GS39purukadu:3_0: tasya svīkaraṇam anuprāśanaṃ tasya prāśanasyātyāvaśyakatvam atīva īpsitatamatvam
GS39purukadu:3_1: anirvacanīyānandapradātṛtvena retaḥstambhakatvena hetunā karmānuṣṭhānāt pūrvaṃ pracetasaḥ
GS39purukadu:6: * nanu anutarṣasvīkaraṇam adṛṣṭaphalodbodhe upakārakam āho svit
GS39purukadu:7_0: dṛṣṭaphalodbodhe upakārakaṃ veti saṃśayavākyam upanyasya dṛṣṭaphalodbodhe eva sākṣād
GS39purukadu:7_1: upakārakaṃ na kiṃcit svargādiphalavat ānuśravikavākyaṃ kalpyam upakārakam iti manasi
GS39purukadu:7_2: niścitya pūrvasūtrasya hetutvena dvitīyaṃ sūtram anuśāsti || 1.5]
GS39purukadu:11: * anena vākyena anayoḥ kāryakāraṇasaṃgatiḥ upapāditā bhavati tathā cāyam arthaḥ anutarṣasvīkaraṇe kṛte sati nidhuvanavyāpāre ratyānando
GS39purukadu:13: sūpaśākādidravyasyeva nīrasaḥ svāduḥ prādurbhūyate ity arthaḥ || 2.3
GS39purukadu:14: * anyad apy anirvacanīyam upakārāntaraṃ tṛtīyasūtreṇa anuśāsti
GS39purukadu:18_0: * pāśinaḥ ātmajāyayā saha atiprītyupacayena tādātmyabhāvaṃ gamite sati nimittakāraṇasyātyupakārakatayā
GS39purukadu:19_0: * anena vākyenātyāvaśyakatayā tādṛgvyāpārasya purastāt tādṛṅnirveśanaṃ sampādya tatpurastāt
GS39purukadu:19_1: saptatantoḥ karmādhikāre 'dhikāritā itarathā nimittakāraṇe utsāhaśaktibhraṃśāt sākalyena
GS39purukadu:24: * prayojyasyodañjeḥ prādhānyakartṛtvam abhyutthāne sati sampadyate tadabhāve abhyutthānābhāve nimittāpāye naimittikasyāpy apāya iti nyāyena ratitantraṃ lupyate kutaḥ || 4.2
GS39purukadu:25: * nimittakāraṇasyābhāvāt yathā turīvemādisattve paṭakāryasyotpattir netarathā tathā abhyutthānasattve tantravidhānasyotpattiḥ || 4.3
GS39purukadu:26: * anena vākyenātyāvaśyakatvenānutarṣasvīkaraṇaṃ sampādya tatpurastāt nidhuvanavyāpāre pravṛttir vidheyā iti bhāvaḥ || 4.4
GS39purukadu:27: * idānīṃ sūtracatuṣṭayasya sākalyena kṛtsnaṃ tātparyārthaṃ saṃgṛhya
GS39purukadu:29: prayojye narmavyāpāravistāre abhyutthānaviśiṣṭodañjyabhāve sarvāṅgīṇavyāpāropalakṣitaṃ ratitantraṃ kartum adhikārābhāvāt // 5
GS39purukadu:31: * pūrvasmin sūtre vāhyatantre yat kiṃcid avacchedenādhikārikatvaṃ
GS39purukadu:32: nirūpitam asmin sūtre tu prayojakasya sākalyena narmapravṛttinimittasyābhāve jāyamāne sati prayojyavyāpāre 'pi
GS39purukadu:33: atyantābhāvasya vidhānaṃ nirvyavasāyenaiva prāptaṃ bhavati kiṃcid viśeṣavidhānaṃ yatra nopalabhyata iti bhāvaḥ || 5.2
GS39purukadu:34: * tasmād anutarṣasvīkaraṇād anantaram eva narmakarmādhikāre ādhikārikatvam
GS39purukadu:36: * māghakirātaraghuvaṃśeṣu siddhāntitasya vākyasyaivāyam anuvādaḥ na tv
GS39purukadu:37: apūrvavidhānaṃ svamanīṣayā upakalpya proktam iti śaṅkanīyam || 5.4
GS39purukadu:38: * kiṃ ca dvitīyāvasthām atikrāntasya diṣṭyātmajāyayā saha
GS39purukadu:39_1: abhāvāt sīdhusaṃgrahaṇaṃ paramakāraṇatvena nābhimatam taditarāvasthāyāṃ tu andhasaḥ
GS39purukadu:39_3: eva īdṛksaṃvidā yāthārthyajñānaṃ parikalpya tādṛkkarmādhikāre anutarṣasvīkaraṇam
GS39purukadu:39_4: atyāvaśyakatamam iti narmavyāpārakartṇām āptavākyavat yathārthopadeśam anuśāsti ||
GS39purukadu:43_0: ṣaḍvidharasād atirikto yo rasaḥ amṛtāndhasām upabhogayogya iti yāvat kādambararasasya
GS39purukadu:43_1: anuprāśanasya paramakāraṇatvam tādṛgrase sampīte sati nidhuvanavyāpāravistāre rasabhāvanāviśeṣacaturāṇām
GS39purukadu:44: * kiṃ cānyad apy anirvacanīyaṃ rasaviśeṣāntaraṃ sīdhuprāśanenānudarśayati
GS39purukadu:48_1: iti sūtrārthaḥ * atra puṣkarādhipatiśabdena pratīcyāḥ kāṣṭhāyāḥ adhipatir lakṣyate
GS39purukadu:48_2: tasya ātmajāyāḥ vāruṇyā anuprāśane kriyamāṇe lalitavibhramabandhānāṃ
GS39purukadu:49_0: prakaṭīkaraṇe prayojikā bhavati netarathā kṛtsnavāṅmayasyādhidaivikarūpatvāt nirvyavasāyenaiva
GS39purukadu:49_1: antaḥkaraṇasyāhlādakāḥ rucikaraprabandhāḥ atalapradeśāt kamalaniḥsaraṇam iva prāśanakartur
GS39purukadu:50_0: * idam eva rasaviśeṣāntaraṃ saṃnipatyopakārakanyāyena paramāpūrvasādhane prayojakībhūtaṃ
GS39purukadu:50_1: kāraṇaṃ nirbandhavarṇānāṃ śravaṇamātreṇa taddvārā manasijodbodhe anirvacanīyasādhanatvena
GS39purukadu:55: * śyāmāvasthāyā upa samīpe vartate sā upaśyāmā tayā caturdaśapañcadaśahāyanātmikayā yoṣayā saha madhuvārā madhupānāvṛttiḥ
GS39purukadu:56: udañjidhārṣṭye atyantadṛḍhataratve prayojako bhavati anena vākyena parisaṃkhyāvidheḥ svarūpaṃ prakāśitaṃ bhavati || 8.2
GS39purukadu:57_0: * tathā cāyam arthaḥ atikrāntāvasthayā saha madhuvāre jāyamāne udañjidhārṣṭyaṃ naivotpadyate
GS39purukadu:57_1: tayā saha tādṛgvyavasāyaḥ vaiyarthyatāṃ pratipadyate nyubjaghaṭopari jalapūraṇanyāyena
GS39purukadu:58: udañjidhārṣṭye manīṣāvatā puruṣeṇa galitayauvanayā saha madhuvāro naiva kartavya ity arthaḥ * nirarthakaprayāse kasyāpi matir naivotpadyata iti nyāyāt || 8.4
GS39purukadu:63: * ṣoḍaśavārṣikī śyāmeti vātsyāyanasūtre prasiddhiḥ tādṛgavasthayā yoṣayā
GS39purukadu:64_0: saha niveśanaṃ pānaṃ patiṣu nirviviśur madam aṅganā ity atra nirveśanaśabde pānaṃ
GS39purukadu:64_1: lakṣyate yāmapramāṇaṃ yāmadvayasaṃ pramāṇe dvayasaj iti sūtreṇa pramāṇārthe dvayasacpratyayaḥ
GS39purukadu:64_2: tādṛkpramāṇopalakṣite diṣṭe kāle kālo diṣṭopyanehāpīti kośasmaraṇāt tāvat kālam abhivyāpyeti
GS39purukadu:64_3: yāvat retaḥstambhane paramakāraṇam iti tayā saha kāpiśāyanasya svīkaraṇe kriyamāṇe
GS39purukadu:66: * idānīṃ narmavyāpāravistāre 'paricitanarmasukhānandāya nidhuvanāt pūrvaṃ kāpiśāyanaprāśanaṃ narmakhedāpanuttaye 'tyāvaśyakatvenānudarśayati || 9.3]
GS39purukadu:69_0: * nirgataṃ tanūruhaṃ yasmāt tat nistanūruhaṃ tanūruhāṇāṃ prādurbhāveṇa rahitaṃ tac
GS39purukadu:69_1: ca tat varāṅgaṃ ca tasya sambhedanaṃ svakīyenodañjinā mukhavidāraṇaṃ tādṛkkarmaṇi
GS39purukadu:70_0: kārayitavyam kṛte aireyaprāśane manasijasadmavidīrṇavyathā sambhedakāle nānubhūyate
GS39purukadu:70_1: itarathā sadmavidīrṇajanyavyathayā sadmani sthitānāṃ nāḍīnāṃ viparyāsena vyānavāyau
GS39purukadu:70_2: saṃkaṭavyathā atitarām anubhūyate tadvyathānivāraṇārthaṃ nidhuvanāt pūrvaṃ dvipalapramāṇaṃ
GS39purukadu:71: * tayā yoṣayā kāpiśāyane pīte sati uttarasūtreṇa pānajanyaṃ yat sukhaṃ tad darśayati || 10.3]
GS39purukadu:75: anusaṃdhānābhāvāt nirbhedajanyā vyathā nānubhūyate ity arthaḥ || 11.2
GS39purukadu:77: uttarasmin ghasre asaṃbheditam iva varāṅgaṃ paridṛśyate // 12
GS39purukadu:79: * varāṅgavidīrṇād anantaram uttarasmin ghasre dine asaṃbheditam iva avidīrṇam iva paridṛśyate varāṅgam idam eva upakārakāntaram || 12.2
GS39purukadu:80: * yoṣāyā anuprāśanena taddvārā uttararūpe phalavaiśiṣṭyaṃ saṃpradarśayati
GS39purukadu:81: kriyamāṇe narmavyāpāre udañjer dhārṣṭyasya phalegrahiḥ paridṛśyate // 13
GS39purukadu:83: * uttararūpeṇa kriyamāṇe narmavyāpāre nidhuvanavyāpāre udañjer dhārṣṭyasya
GS39purukadu:84_0: yaṣṭikāṇḍam iva atikaṭhinatāṃ samprāptasya meḍhrasya phalegrahir avandhyasāmarthyaṃ
GS39purukadu:84_1: paridṛśyate * etad uktaṃ bhavati kāpiśāyanasya anuprāśanamātreṇātisaṃkucitatvaṃ prāptasya
GS39purukadu:84_2: yoṣāyāḥ varāṅgasya atidṛḍhatamasyāpy udañjeḥ varāṅgamukhavidīrṇane sāmarthyābhāvāt
GS39purukadu:85: * saṃbhedite 'pi varāṅge kāpiśāyanaprāśanena atisaṃkocaṃ prāptasya yoṣāyāḥ varāṅgasya vivarakaraṇe udañjau mahatī vyathā prādurbhūyate iti bhāvaḥ ||
GS39purukadu:86: * anena vākyena dvitīyavṛttāv api punaḥ yo 'nividīrṇasukhaṃ puruṣo
GS39purukadu:88_0: * śyāmayā saha nirveśane ratisukhodbodhanaṃ vīryastambhanaṃ kālāvadhiṃ ca proktam
GS39purukadu:88_1: upaśyāmayā saha krīḍane samupasthitau tatrāpi aireyasvīkaraṇasya atyāvaśyakatvenānuvidhānaṃ
GS39purukadu:88_2: vidadhāti upaśyāmayā saha vyānatādibandhe samupasthitau pāśina ātmajāyāḥ svīkaraṇe
GS39purukadu:90: * aprāptayauvanābhiḥ saha bāhyatantre manīṣāyāḥ samupasthitau aṇumātraṃ
GS39purukadu:91: tasyai prāśayitavyaṃ tāvanmātreṇaiva ubhayoḥ ānandasukhānulabdheḥ cumbanādivyāpāre anuvidhīyamāne alpasvīkāramātreṇa ānandānubhavadarśanāt na tatra ādhikyena pāśinaḥ || 14.2
GS39purukadu:92: * ātmajāyāḥ svīkaraṇam iti hetuvādaṃ manasi nidhāya auttarīyaṃ sūtram anuśāsti || 14.3]
GS39purukadu:95: * idānīm utkaṭayauvanāvasthāyām aireyaprāśanaṃ ratitantravilāse upadiśyate netarāvasthāyām upayogābhāvād anadhikāritvād ity ālocya dvitīyāvasthāyām
GS39purukadu:97: tīyapratyayasya prakṛtibhūtāyām avasthāyāṃ kaśyasvīkaraṇasyātyāvaśyakatvaṃ sati pūrvarūpasaṃyoge * tīyapratyayasya prakṛtibhūtāyām iti || 17.1
GS39purukadu:98: * tīyapratyayasya prakṛtibhūtāyām avasthāyāṃ dvitīyāyām avasthāyāṃ dves
GS39purukadu:99_0: tīya ity anena dviśabdāt tīyapratyaye sati dvitīyaśabdo niṣpadyate tasyām avasthāyāṃ
GS39purukadu:100: * nanu dṛṣṭaprayojanam uddiśya svīkaraṇaṃ vidhīyate vā adṛṣṭaphalam uddiśya vā dṛṣṭaprayojanasyaivātrākāṅkṣitatvān nādṛṣṭaprayojanam uddiśyeti
GS39purukadu:101_0: dṛṣṭaprayojanaṃ tu udañjidārḍhyapūrvarūpasya dṛṣṭaprayojanaṃ tu āsyorojādyavayaveṣu
GS39purukadu:101_2: puruṣeṇa yoṣayā saha atyāvaśyakatvena sīdhugrahaṇaṃ rativilāsakāle sarvathaiva kartavyam
GS39purukadu:102: * saṃprasāraṇaviśiṣṭatīyapratyayasya prakṛtibhūtāyām avasthāyāṃ tu nātyāvaśyakam ity āha ||
GS39purukadu:105: * diṣṭakanyayā vyāptāyām avasthāyām urojandhayāyām avasthāyāṃ ca tasya prāśane nādhikārikatvam iti || 18.2
GS39purukadu:109: * ekatra paugaṇḍavayasaḥ puruṣakalpasya uttarasmin kāle upaśyāmayā
GS39purukadu:110: samīkṛte anehasi andhasaḥ rasasya retasaḥ paripakvatāyāḥ abhāvāt tādṛkkarmādhikāre nādhikāritā itaratra pāñcabhautikāvayavānāṃ kṣīṇataratvāc ca // 20
GS39purukadu:112: * jīrṇāvasthāyām api tadānīṃ diṣṭakanyayā saha atinarmavyavasāyena
GS39purukadu:113: sarvāsām indriyavṛttānāṃ svakīyapravṛttau kṣīṇataratvasya dṛśyamānatvān nādhikārakatvam ||
GS39purukadu:114: * bālasya tathā jarāvataḥ puruṣasya ubhayoḥ narmakarmādhikāre
GS39purukadu:116: * kāraṇarūpopādhau satyāṃ kāryarūpasyopādheḥ anudarśanam iti nyāyena
GS39purukadu:117_0: padmāyāḥ anugraheṇa paripūritānāṃ sārvabhaumādīnām eva anayā puṣpadhanuṣaḥ saraṇyā
GS39purukadu:117_1: anuvartanaṃ sārvakālikaṃ nityakarmādhikāravat yuktataraṃ nānyeṣām iti prakaraṇopasaṃhāram
GS39purukadu:117_2: anudarśayati haripriyāvatāṃ janānām etac chākheṇānuvartanam atyāvaśyakam // 21
GS39purukadu:119: * nanu ekatra vidhāne niṣedhavākyaṃ kutra vidhīyate ity uktaṃ cet
GS39purukadu:124: * nanu atyāvaśyakatvena īdṛkkarmavidhānaṃ kutrābhivyāptam iti cet tat sthānaṃ saṃpradarśayati pāriśeṣyāj jaladhisambhavayā yukteṣv etac chāstrasya pravṛttiḥ // 23
GS39purukadu:126: * pariśeṣasya bhāvaḥ pāriśeṣyaṃ tasmāt niṣedhavyāptyā rahitāt
GS39purukadu:127: pārāvāratanūjayā saṃyukteṣv eva kāpi śāyanasvīkaraṇaśāstrasya pravṛttiḥ anirvacanīyānandabodhāya pravartata ity arthaḥ || 23.2
GS39purukadu:131: * gotrāyāḥ apatyaṃ tasya ghasraṃ dinaṃ tasmin dine anutarṣasvīkaraṇam iti
GS39purukadu:136: * śukro daityaguruḥ kāvya iti kośābhidhānāt ghasro dināhanī vā tv ity amaraḥ || 25.2
GS39purukadu:142_0: * śaktyupāsanāvatām evāyaṃ niyamaḥ yat ghasradvaye 'py anuvartanaṃ taditareṣāṃ janānāṃ
GS39purukadu:142_1: pralambaghnamatānuyāyināṃ tu yathākālopadeśa iti na ghasradvaye parisaṃkhyānam ity
GS39purukadu:146: * kṣatrajātau dvitīyavarṇe kāpiśāyanasvīkaraṇavidhānaṃ sārvakālikaṃ tāmasīprakṛteḥ upāsanādhikāravatāṃ nirantaraṃ kādambarasvīkaraṇaṃ kartavyatvenābhimatam || 28.2
GS39purukadu:147: * aparokṣānubhavena tatsvarūpānudarśane upādānakāraṇatvāt ātmabhuvaḥ tanoḥ upāsanādhikāravat na ghasrayoḥ anuvartanam || 28.3
GS39purukadu:151: * vājapeye surāgrahān gṛhṇāti sautrāmaṇyāṃ surāgrahān gṛhṇātīti
GS39purukadu:152: vākyadvayena prathamavarṇikasya yathāvācanikam eva grahaṇaprāśaneṣu ādhikāriko vidhiḥ || 29.2
GS39purukadu:153: * tathā cāyam arthaḥ vājapeye tu grahaṇamātrasyaivābhyanujñānaṃ
GS39purukadu:154: prāśanābhyanujñānaṃ tu tṛtīyavarṇasyaiva tathā cānuśravikavākyaṃ vimāthaṃ kurvate vājasṛta iti || 29.3
GS39purukadu:155: * sautrāmaṇyāṃ tu yāgakartur eva prāśanaṃ nigamavākyenābhidhīyate
GS39purukadu:156: netareṣām ṛtvijām tatrāpy āghrāṇenaiva prāśanapratipattir iti matāntaram iti ṛṣyantarāṇāṃ vacanam iti || 29.4
GS39purukadu:157_0: * sārvakālikābhyanujñānaṃ tu rasādhipatīnām eva nānyeṣāṃ janānām iti prakaraṇārtham
GS39purukadu:157_1: upasaṃharati khaṇḍamaṇḍalādhipatyādīnām indirāvatāṃ janānām api sīdhugrahaṇasya vilāsaḥ
GS39purukadu:159: * alpaviṣayasya śāsanakartṇāṃ rājñāṃ lokamātur anugraheṇa paripūritānāṃ
GS39purukadu:160: sīdhugrahaṇena vilāsānubhavaḥ vilāsānām anubhavanaṃ sārvakālikam na surathavaiśyādīnāṃ matam anusṛtya pravartanam ity arthaḥ || 30.2
GS39purukadu:164: * nidhuvanakāle eva svapatibhiḥ sārdhaṃ kādambarasvīkaraṇasyābhyanujñānaṃ netarāvasthāyāṃ kutaḥ upayogābhāvāt niṣphalaprayāse svīkaraṇasya vaiyarthyāpatteḥ || 31.2
GS39purukadu:168: * ananyajena kriyamāṇeṣu makheṣv eva atyāvaśyakatvena anutarṣasvīkaraṇavidhānaṃ netaratra tadatiriktakāleṣv iti || 32.2
GS39purukadu:169_0: * yoṣāyāḥ atra yoṣāsaṃgraheṇa upaśyāmādīnām eva saṃgrahaḥ na vibhraṃśitadvitīyāvasthānām
GS39purukadu:169_1: āsyapadmena prāśanaṃ tu atyutkṛṣṭaphalaviśeṣāntaraṃ niścitya atyāvaśyakatvena prāśanam
GS39purukadu:169_2: anudarśayati yoṣāyāḥ āsyapadmena prāśanaṃ bhāṣāyāḥ prabodhe avyabhicaritakāraṇam //
GS39purukadu:171_0: * yoṣāyāḥ āsyapadmena prāśane kriyamāṇe yathecchikī bhāṣāyāḥ anusphurtir bhavatīty
GS39purukadu:171_1: arthaḥ * anena vākyena śravaṇādivyavasāyarahite 'pi jane niṣprayāsenaiva tridaśānāṃ
GS39purukadu:172: * anyad apy utkṛṣṭataraṃ phalaviśeṣāntaraṃ svīkāramātreṇa saṃpradarśayati
GS39purukadu:173: śyāmāyā āsyasahasrapattrād anuprāśanam aparokṣānubhavena mūlaprakṛteḥ svarūpasyānudarśanam * śyāmāyā āsyasahasrapattrād iti || 34.1
GS39purukadu:174_0: * śyāmāyāḥ kamalaprasūnāt anuprāśanaṃ pratyakṣānubhavena sākṣāt mūlaprakṛteḥ svarūpānudarśane
GS39purukadu:174_1: hetuḥ kāraṇam iti tayā saha saṃprāśane kriyamāṇe kṛtsnasya prapañcasya kāraṇabhūtāyāḥ
GS39purukadu:175: * yad vā tatsvarūpaṃ sākṣād avyavadhānena paśyatīty arthaḥ || 34.3
GS39purukadu:176: * anena vākyena sāyujyādikaṃ phalam api nirāyāsena prāpnotīty arthaḥ ||
GS39purukadu:179: * tat sarvaṃ tu prakartavyaṃ yoṣāyāḥ sukhalabdhaye || 34.7
GS39purukadu:181: * phaladvayaṃ sa prāpnoti prajāṃ kāmasukhaṃ tathā || 34.9
GS39purukadu:182: * urvaśīlokam āpnoti antakāle tu saḥ pumān || 34.10
GS39purukadu:183: * iti śrīmahārājarṣivaryeṇa purūravasā viracitaṃ kāmijanānāṃ vinodāya
